data.name: DEMON GAZE EXTRA - Live the Posh Hunter Life! Luxury Furniture Set
data.detailed_description:
*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content. If necessary, please install the latest software patch(es).

●Description
Live the Posh Hunter Life! Luxury Furniture Set
This is a set of high-grade furniture and jewels (in-game currency) that can be displayed in the private rooms of party members to enhance their abilities. For celebrity hunters who wish to enjoy an elegant life!
*The purchase of this product is limited to once per account. Please note that multiple purchases are not possible.

The following items are included:
-Dark Angel Portrait x1
-Doriad's Shelf x1
-Demon of Light Statue x1
-Great Spirit's Blessing Bed x1
-Cockatrice Quilt x1
-Enchanted Forest Cat x1
-Large Gem x1
-Small Gem x1
-Gemstone x1
--
Total items: 9

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-2510E 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
